TraitDef.label: Gunslinger
TraitDef.description: This person knows how to draw and aim a gun with blinding speed. It doesn't help at range, but when the target is close, this person always gets the shot off first.

TraitDef.label: Runner
TraitDef.description: This person is a well-conditioned runner.

TraitDef.label: Tough
TraitDef.description: This person can take a remarkable amount of punishment before falling.
